Name: M.E.M.E.S.
About the game: You awaken in the eternal dimensions after having lived a meaningful life in the temporary dimension. Then, you ceased existence. This means that you will now be in the eternal dimensions, forever. Mr. â„¢, the guide of the eternal dimensions, will show you around, and soon you will learn that the way to ultimate ACCOMPLISHEMENT lies in hard work, persistence and determination! Achieve what every ENTITY dreams of, and reach the ETERNAL PARADISE! MAIN FEATURES M.E.M.E.S. (Multi-Elemental Minimalistic Entertainment System) is a non-linear minimalistic RPG with an eerie vibe and surreal humor. It has an amazing color palette of 24 colors, features 11 songs and 8 character sprites! What more could you want?! Features include, but are not limited to: Generic, boring JRPG battles! Can't afford to gamble in a real casino? We've got a virtual one! Can't afford a real house? Buy a virtual one, painted with green pixels! Can't buy a real weapon? Buy a virtual one, it deals 62 damage! Too scared to talk to real people? Chat with ENTITIES! Batteries not included.
